page.title: 15Social concerns in our area.
page.content: We were concerned in (a) getting reaction to{considerable development in the area, (b) pinpointing anxieties at{personal, local}and{international level. (a) about half the respondents {welcomed the new developments}(eg Asda Superstore), the other half regretted the{loss of countryside, increased {traffic}and the{disappearance of small {personalised shops.}Older residents were more critical than young ones. (b) older people were concerned with health problems and{cuts in the {Health Service.}At local and national levels everyone was worrried about {employment}and other social problems such as{vandalism,increasing crime}and {violence}among the young. The main concerns at an international level were{'nuclear war'}and{'famine'}in the Third World.
